original_text: But the Israelites did not burn the cities that were built on small hills. Hazor was the only city like that which Joshua did burn.
korean_text: 여호수아가 하솔만 불살랐고 산 위에 세운 성읍들은 이스라엘이 불사르지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: But the Israelites did not burn the cities
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이스라엘 사람들은 그 도시들을 불태우지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: that were built on small hills
Hazor was the only city like that
sentences.korean_translation: 하솔은 그런 도시 중 유일한 도시였습니다
